dict.acceptation: 故意地；深思熟虑地；从容不迫地；

sent.orig: He rose deliberately from his chair and came towards them across the soundless carpet.
sent.trans: 他慢吞吞地从椅子上欠身站了起来，走过无声的地毯，向他们这边过来。

sent.orig: As far as Africans are concerned, both these avenues of advancement are deliberately curtailed by legislation.
sent.trans: 就南非黑人而言，这两条向上发展之路均受到立法的蓄意限制。

sent.orig: The raging horse with red wane dominating racing track, is galloping freely and speeding deliberately!
sent.trans: 主宰赛道的红鬃烈马，自由的奔腾，任意的飞驰！

sent.orig: He interfered with her work deliberately.
